subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The first college football game in the new Yankee Stadium will be held Saturday and feature Notre Dame and Army, who played nearly every year from 1925 to 1946, in games that were like today’s Super Bowls.
snippet: The first college football game in the new Yankee Stadium will be held Saturday and feature Notre Dame and Army, who played nearly every year from 1925 to 1946, in games that were like today’s Super Bowls.
